item.description:
Join some "meeting&greeting" group folks for dinner and the movie, "The Lucky One", at the Chunkys Cinema located in the Pelham Shopping Center on Route 38 (in the Hannaford Shopping plaza.).

Relax, unwind, eat dinner and then sit back in the nice comfy cadillac recliner seat to enjoy the movie "from the acclaimed bestselling author of The Notebook and Dear John, starring Zac Efron and Taylor Schilling", http://theluckyonemovie.warnerbros.com/index.html

Showtime - 7:00PM

Admission - $7.50

"Be the Lucky One", (6) Discount admission tickets available from Susan for $5.00

item.name: Dinner & Movie-"The Lucky One" in Pelham NH
